business.description: Indicates if it's a business or a personal address

full_name.description: Company name (business) of first name and last name (personal)

line_1.description: Address line 1, i.e. Street address, PO Box

line_2.description: Address line 2, i.e. Apartment, Suite, Building

country_code.description: The international 2-letter country code as defined by the ISO 3166-1 standard

full_address.description: Compact description of the address location, without the full name
full_address.example: 2883 Geraldine Lane Apt.23, 10013 New York NY (US) (212) 646-338-1228

name.description: Compact description of the address location, including the full name
name.example: John Smith, 2883 Geraldine Lane Apt.23, 10013 New York NY (US) (212) 646-338-1228

notes.description: A free notes attached to the address. When used as a shipping address, this can be useful to let the customers add specific delivery instructions.

lat.description: The address geocoded latitude. This is automatically generated when creating a shipping/billing address for an order and a valid geocoder is attached to the order's market.

lng.description: The address geocoded longitude. This is automatically generated when creating a shipping/billing address for an order and a valid geocoder is attached to the order's market.

is_localized.description: Indicates if the latitude and logitude are present, either geocoded or manually updated

is_geocoded.description: Indicates if the address has been successfully geocoded

provider_name.description: The geocoder provider name (either Google or Bing)

map_url.description: The map url of the geocoded address (if geocoded)

static_map_url.description: The static map image url of the geocoded address (if geocoded)

billing_info.description: Customer's billing information (i.e. VAT number, codice fiscale)

formatted_discount.description: The discount applied to the line item, fromatted. When you apply a discount to an order, this is automatically calculated basing on the line item total_amount_cents value.

total_amount_cents.description: Calculated as unit amount x quantity + options amount, in cents.

total_amount_float.description: Calculated as unit amount x quantity + options amount, float. This can be useful to track the purchase on thrid party systems, e.g Google Analyitcs Enhanced Ecommerce.

formatted_total_amount.description: Calculated as unit amount x quantity + options amount, formatted. This can be useful to display the amount with currency in you views.

tax_amount_cents.description: Calculated as total amount cents - discount cent * tax rate, in cents.

formatted_tax_amount.description: Calculated as total amount cents - discount cent * tax rate, formatted.

reference_origin.description: Any identifier of the third party system that defines the reference code

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to the resource. This can be useful for storing additional information about the resource in a structured format.

order_amount_cents.description: Apply the promotion only when order is over this amount, in cents.

status.description: The order status. One of 'draft' (default), 'pending', 'placed', 'approved', or 'cancelled'

payment_status.description: The order's payment status. One of 'unpaid' (default), 'authorized', 'paid', 'voided', or 'refunded'

fulfillment_status.description: The order's fulfillment status. One of 'unfulfilled' (default), 'in_progress', or 'fulfilled'

guest.description: Indicates if the order has been placed as guest.

editable.description: Indicates if the order can be edited.

customer_email.description: The email address of the associated customer. When creating or updating an order, this is a shortcut to find or create the associated customer by email.

language_code.description: The preferred language code (ISO 639-1) to be used when communicating with the customer. This can be useful when sending the order to 3rd party marketing tools and CRMs. If the language is supported, the hosted checkout will be localized accordingly.

currency_code.description: The international 3-letter currency code as defined by the ISO 4217 standard, automatically inherited from the order's market.

tax_included.description: Indicates if taxes are included in the order amounts, automatically inherited from the order's price list.

tax_rate.description: The tax rate for this order (if calculated).

freight_taxable.description: Indicates if taxes are applied to shipping costs.

requires_billing_info.description: Indicates if the billing address associated to this order requires billing info to be present.

country_code.description: The international 2-letter country code as defined by the ISO 3166-1 standard, automatically inherited from the order's shipping address.

shipping_country_code_lock.description: The country code that you want the shipping address to be locked to. This can be useful to make sure the shipping address belongs to a given shipping country, e.g. the one selected in a country selector page.

coupon_code.description: The coupon code to be used for the order. If valid, it triggers a promotion adding a discount line item to the order.

gift_card_code.description: The gift card code (at least the first 8 characters) to be used for the order. If valid, it uses the gift card balance to pay for the order.

gift_card_or_coupon_code.description: The gift card or coupon code (at least the first 8 characters) to be used for the order. If a gift card mathes, it uses the gift card balance to pay for the order. Otherwise it tries to find a valid coupon code and applies the associated discount.

subtotal_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the sku line items total amounts, in cents.

subtotal_amount_float.description: The sum of all the sku line items total amounts, float.

formatted_subtotal_amount.description: The sum of all the sku line items total amounts, formatted.

shipping_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the shipping costs, in cents.

shipping_amount_float.description: The sum of all the shipping costs, float.

formatted_shipping_amount.description: The sum of all the shipping costs, formatted.

payment_method_amount_cents.description: The payment method costs, in cents.

discount_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the discounts applied to the order, in cents (negative amount).

discount_amount_float.description: The sum of all the discounts applied to the order, float.

formatted_discount_amount.description: The sum of all the discounts applied to the order, formatted.

adjustment_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the adjustments applied to the order, in cents.

adjustment_amount_float.description: The sum of all the adjustments applied to the order, float.

formatted_adjustment_amount.description: The sum of all the adjustments applied to the order, formatted.

gift_card_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the gift_cards applied to the order, in cents.

gift_card_amount_float.description: The sum of all the gift_cards applied to the order, float.

formatted_gift_card_amount.description: The sum of all the gift_cards applied to the order, formatted.

total_tax_amount_cents.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order, in cents.

total_tax_amount_float.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order, float.

formatted_total_tax_amount.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order, formatted.

subtotal_tax_amount_cents.description: The taxes applied to the order's subtotal, in cents.

subtotal_tax_amount_float.description: The taxes applied to the order's subtotal, float.

formatted_subtotal_tax_amount.description: The taxes applied to the order's subtotal, formatted.

shipping_tax_amount_cents.description: The taxes applied to the order's shipping costs, in cents.

shipping_tax_amount_float.description: The taxes applied to the order's shipping costs, float.

formatted_shipping_tax_amount.description: The taxes applied to the order's shipping costs, formatted.

payment_method_tax_amount_cents.description: The taxes applied to the order's payment method costs, in cents.

payment_method_tax_amount_float.description: The taxes applied to the order's payment method costs, float.

formatted_payment_method_tax_amount.description: The taxes applied to the order's payment method costs, formatted.

adjustment_tax_amount_cents.description: The taxes applied to the order adjustments, in cents.

adjustment_tax_amount_float.description: The taxes applied to the order adjustments, float.

formatted_adjustment_tax_amount.description: The taxes applied to the order adjustments, formatted.

total_amount_cents.description: The order's total amount, in cents.

total_taxable_amount_cents.description: The order's total taxable amount, in cents (equal to total_amount_cents when prices don't include taxes).

total_taxable_amount_float.description: The order's total taxable amount, float.

formatted_total_taxable_amount.description: The order's total taxable amount, formatted.

subtotal_taxable_amount_cents.description: The order's subtotal taxable amount, in cents (equal to subtotal_amount_cents when prices don't include taxes).

subtotal_taxable_amount_float.description: The order's subtotal taxable amount, float.

formatted_subtotal_taxable_amount.description: The order's subtotal taxable amount, formatted.

shipping_taxable_amount_cents.description: The order's shipping taxable amount, in cents (equal to shipping_amount_cents when prices don't include taxes).

shipping_taxable_amount_float.description: The order's shipping taxable amount, float.

formatted_shipping_taxable_amount.description: The order's shipping taxable amount, formatted.

payment_method_taxable_amount_cents.description: The order's payment method taxable amount, in cents (equal to payment_method_amount_cents when prices don't include taxes).

payment_method_taxable_amount_float.description: The order's payment method taxable amount, float.

formatted_payment_method_taxable_amount.description: The order's payment method taxable amount, formatted.

adjustment_taxable_amount_cents.description: The order's adjustment taxable amount, in cents (equal to discount_adjustment_cents when prices don't include taxes).

adjustment_taxable_amount_float.description: The order's adjustment taxable amount, float.

formatted_adjustment_taxable_amount.description: The order's adjustment taxable amount, formatted.

total_amount_with_taxes_cents.description: The order's total amount (when prices include taxes) or the order's total + taxes amount (when prices don't include taxes, e.g. US Markets or B2B)

total_amount_with_taxes_float.description: The order's total amount with taxes, float.

formatted_total_amount_with_taxes.description: The order's total amount with taxes, formatted.

fees_amount_cents.description: The fees amount that is applied by Commerce Layer, in cents.

fees_amount_float.description: The fees amount that is applied by Commerce Layer, float.

formatted_fees_amount.description: The fees amount that is applied by Commerce Layer, formatted.

duty_amount_cents.description: The duty amount that is calculated by external services, in cents.

duty_amount_float.description: The duty amount that is calculated by external services, float.

formatted_duty_amount.description: The duty amount that is calculated by external services, formatted.

skus_count.description: The total number of skus in the order's line items. This can be useful to display a preview of the customer shopping cart content.

line_item_options_count.description: The total number of line item options. This can be useful to display a preview of the customer shopping cart content.

shipments_count.description: The total number of shipments. This can be useful to manage the shipping method(s) selection during checkout.

payment_source_details.description: An object that contains the shareable details of the order's payment source.

token.description: A unique token that can be shared more securely instead of the order's id.

cart_url.description: The cart url on your site. If present, it will be used on our hosted checkout application.

return_url.description: The return url on your site. If present, it will be used on our hosted checkout application.

terms_url.description: The terms and conditions url on your site. If present, it will be used on our hosted checkout application.

privacy_url.description: The privacy policy url on your site. If present, it will be used on our hosted checkout application.

checkout_url.description: The checkout url that was automatically generated for the order. Send the customers to this url to let them checkout the order securely on our hosted checkout application.

placed_at.description: Time at which the order was placed.

approved_at.description: Time at which the order was approved.

cancelled_at.description: Time at which the order was cancelled.

payment_updated_at.description: Time at which the order's payment status was last updated.

fulfillment_updated_at.description: Time at which the order's fulfillment status was last updated.

archived_at.description: Time at which the resource has been archived.

expires_at.description: Time at which an order is marked for cleanup. Any order will start with a default expire time of 2 months. Expiration is reset once a line item is added to the order.

created_at.description: Time at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: Time at which the resource was last updated.

_archive.description: Send this attribute if you want to archive the order.

_unarchive.description: Send this attribute if you want to unarchive the order.

_place.description: Send this attribute if you want to place the order.

_cancel.description: Send this attribute if you want to cancel a placed order. The order's authorization will be automatically voided.

_approve.description: Send this attribute if you want to approve a placed order.

_approve_and_capture.description: Send this attribute if you want to approve and capture a placed order.

_authorize.description: Send this attribute if you want to authorize the order's payment source.

_capture.description: Send this attribute if you want to capture an approved order.

_refund.description: Send this attribute if you want to refund a captured order.

_update_taxes.description: Send this attribute if you want to force tax calculation for this order (a tax calculator must be associated to the order's market).

_billing_address_clone_id.description: The id of the address that you want to clone to create the order's billing address.

_shipping_address_clone_id.description: The id of the address that you want to clone to create the order's shipping address.

_customer_payment_source_id.description: The id of the customer payment source (i.e. credit card) that you want to use as the order's payment source.

_shipping_address_same_as_billing.description: Send this attribute if you want the shipping address to be cloned from the order's billing address.

_billing_address_same_as_shipping.description: Send this attribute if you want the billing address to be cloned from the order's shipping address.

_save_payment_source_to_customer_wallet.description: Send this attribute if you want the order's payment source to be saved in the customer's wallet as a customer payment source.

_save_shipping_address_to_customer_addre.description: Send this attribute if you want the order's shipping address to be saved in the customer's address book as a customer address.

_save_billing_address_to_customer_addres.description: Send this attribute if you want the order's billing address to be saved in the customer's address book as a customer address.

_refresh.description: Send this attribute if you want to refresh an order.

weight.description: The parcel weight, used to automatically calculate the tax rates from the available carrier accounts.

unit_of_weight.description: The unit of weight. Can be one of 'gr', or 'oz'.

eel_pfc.description: When shipping outside the US, you need to provide either an Exemption and Exclusion Legend (EEL) code or a Proof of Filing Citation (PFC). Which you need is based on the value of the goods being shipped. Value can be one of "EEL" o "PFC".

contents_type.description: The type of item you are sending. Can be one of 'merchandise', 'gift', 'documents', 'returned_goods', 'sample', or 'other'.

contents_explanation.description: If you specify 'other' in the 'contents_type' attribute, you must supply a brief description in this attribute.

customs_certify.description: Indicates if the provided information is accurate

customs_signer.description: This is the name of the person who is certifying that the information provided on the customs form is accurate. Use a name of the person in your organization who is responsible for this.

non_delivery_option.description: In case the shipment cannot be delivered, this option tells the carrier what you want to happen to the parcel. You can pass either 'return', or 'abandon'. The value defaults to 'return'. If you pass 'abandon', you will not receive the parcel back if it cannot be delivered.

restriction_type.description: Describes if your parcel requires any special treatment or quarantine when entering the country. Can be one of 'none', 'other', 'quarantine', or 'sanitary_phytosanitary_inspection'.

restriction_comments.description: If you specify 'other' in the restriction type, you must supply a brief description of what is required.

customs_info_required.description: Indicates if the parcel requires customs info to get the shipping rates.

shipping_label_url.description: The shipping label url, ready to be downloaded and printed.

shipping_label_file_type.description: The shipping label file type. One of 'application/pdf', 'application/zpl', 'application/epl2', or 'image/png'.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number associated to this parcel.

tracking_status.description: The tracking status for this parcel, automatically updated in real time by the shipping carrier.

tracking_status_detail.description: Additional information about the tracking status, automatically updated in real time by the shipping carrier.

tracking_status_updated_at.description: Time at which the parcel's tracking status was last updated.

tracking_details.description: The parcel's full tracking history, automatically updated in real time by the shipping carrier.

carrier_weight_oz.description: The weight of the parcel as measured by the carrier in ounces (if available)

signed_by.description: The name of the person who signed for the parcel (if available)

circuit_state.description: The circuit breaker state, by default it is 'closed'. It can become 'open' once the number of consecutive failures overlaps the specified threshold, in such case no further calls to the failing callback are made.

circuit_failure_count.description: The number of consecutive failures recorded by the circuit breaker associated to this webhook, will be reset on first successful call to callback.
